md.name: descriptive
md.value: <record xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim http://www.loc.gov/standards/marcxml/schema/MARC21slim.xsd"><leader>02808ntm a22003377a 4500</leader><controlfield tag="001">001173423</controlfield><controlfield tag="003">CZ PrCU</controlfield><controlfield tag="005">20091127161651.0</controlfield><controlfield tag="008">091127s2005 xr f m |0 cze d</controlfield><datafield tag="040" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">ABD027</subfield><subfield code="b">cze</subfield><subfield code="9">1</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="100" ind1="1" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Koubová, Jana</subfield><subfield code="4">dis</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="245" ind1="1" ind2="0"><subfield code="a">Metoda Videotrénink interakcí</subfield><subfield code="h">[rukopis] :</subfield><subfield code="b">(aplikace metody VTI na oddělení LDN ve Fakultní nemocnici Motol) : bakalářská práce /</subfield><subfield code="c">Jana Koubová ; vedoucí práce: Marie Lhotová</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="260" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Praha,</subfield><subfield code="c">2005</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="300" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">[78 l.] :</subfield><subfield code="b">il. příl.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="502" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Bakalářská práce (Bc.) -- Univerzita Karlova. Evangelická teologická fakulta, 2005</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="504" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Obsahuje bibliografii</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="520" ind1="9" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">In my bachelor work I am writing about Video Home Training (VTI in Czech) which comes from the Netherlands. I have divided my work into two parts. One is the theoretical part and the other is the practical part. The theoretical part is about the history of VTI, about specific parts of this program. I am writing here about SPIN (Civic Initiative). It is the only association which cares about videotraining in the Czech Republic. The specific group who I am interested in is a group of old people in FN Motol (Teaching Hospital). Last year I was working at Long-stay Hospital as a volunteer. You can find also some of my practical experience with this type of VTI in my bachelor work. I attended a basic course about this metod. I am also writing about it. The practical part is the comparison of my questionnaires with questionnaires of the trainers from the SPIN. Last year they did a specific course for their health visitors, doctors and other workers of Long-stay Hospital. The members of this course had to fill in the questionnaires. The aim of my work is to find if this method is useful and brings some new information for the members. If the method brought them better care, better communication in their professional team, helped them in their professional care. I found that this method is really very useful and the aim of my work has been achieved. A lot of people have decided that they would continue in this course if they could.</subfield><subfield code="9">eng</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">metody</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">komunikace</subfield><subfield code="2">ctt</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">péče o staré</subfield><subfield code="2">ctt</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">péče o nemocné</subfield><subfield code="2">ctt</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">komunikační dovednosti</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="655" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">bakalářské práce</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="4"><subfield code="a">Videotrénink interakcí</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="700" ind1="1" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Lhotová, Marie,</subfield><subfield code="d">1952-</subfield><subfield code="7">js20081027002</subfield><subfield code="4">ths</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="710" ind1="2" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Univerzita Karlova.</subfield><subfield code="b">Evangelická teologická fakulta</subfield><subfield code="7">kn20010710335</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="710" ind1="2" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Jabok - Vyšší sociálně pedagogická a teologická škola</subfield><subfield code="7">kn20020502016</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="856" ind1="4" ind2="1"><subfield code="y">Plný text diplomové práce je přístupný pouze ze sítě Univerzity Karlovy v Praze</subfield><subfield code="u">http://digitool.is.cuni.cz:80/R/?func=dbin-jump-full&object_id=83999</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="981" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">bc</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="980" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">application.pdf</subfield></datafield><controlfield tag="998">001173423</controlfield><datafield tag="SID" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Z39</subfield><subfield code="b">CKS01</subfield></datafield><controlfield tag="FMT">BK</controlfield></record>
